message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this exceptional product. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to acquire a truly unique item. I'm willing to start with a price of $1500000. I'm confident that you'll see the value in this product and be willing to meet this price.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I think the price is a bit steep. I'm willing to offer $900000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the value I've seen so far.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that you think the price is a bit steep, but I have to consider the value of the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit.
